item.title: Comment on a pipeline run
item.description: Beta feature: Comment on a pipeline run Note: This is a beta feature, which is turned off by default in GoCD 14.4.0. It can be turned on by using the feature toggle API, for this feature. If you are using curl, this is what you will need to do: curl -d toggle_value=on' 'http://go_server/go/api/admin/feature_toggles/pipeline_comment_feature_toggle_key' -H 'Confirm:true' When authentication is turned on in your GoCD Server setup, add the –user option to the curl command, like this:
